      • display_add_booking_now

        public static void display_add_booking_now(Attendee att)
        Ask the user if they want to set a booking to this attendee. This is best used when a booking has been created before this attendee. New bookings require an attendee/booker so the user should say no if they do not yet have a booking created
        Parameters:
        att - Attendee
